RelatedSentence: Vodafone Germany 's discount brand Otelo has launched new smartphone tariffs to replace existing tariffs , teltarif.de reports .
The new tariffs offer inclusive units and data allowances for smartphone users .

Targeted at normal users , the Otelo Smartphone 300 pre-paid option offers 300 units for calls and texts in Germany , an Otelo community flat for calls and texts , plus 300 MB high - speed data for EUR 8.99 per month .

A0: The Otelo Allnet Basic XS plan
RelatedSentence: The Otelo Allnet Basic XS plan offers 250 free units and 250 MB high - speed data for EUR 9.09 per month , and the Otelo Allnet Basic S plan offers 500 units and 250 MB data for EUR 14.99 per month .

A0: the Otelo Allnet Basic S plan
